Text: Re ACalo Cc and Mark unavailable I probably cannot represent her but can ask John Novak You will need to coordinate with John prior to the PRC Side question to Diana Perez Is it even appropriate for Andrea to be reviewed by the ESA Regional PRC when she is part of ENA What is being done on the business side in similar circumstances Randy Brent NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To NRON cc Subject Re ACalo Randy would you be able to represent Andrea at the Business Unit PRC in Sao Paulo Thanks Brent NRON PM To Diana PerezENRON NRON CT cc Brent HendryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Fernanda nron Mark CT Subject Re ACalo She is a Senior Counsel Consistent with our conversation earlier this week I would place her at the director level Diana NRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Brent HendryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Randy YoungENRON CT Fernanda FernandesENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Re ACalo OKthanks Brent is the Supervisor Mark is the PRC rep for the functional meeting in Houston and we have the Business Unit PRC in Sao PauloI will assume Brent that you will represent Andrea Is she a manager level or director thanks diana Brent Hendry AM To Diana PerezENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Randy YoungENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Re ACalo FYI Forwarded by Brent HendryENRONDEVELOPMENT on AM From Mark CT on PM CDT To Brent HendryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Re ACalo In this case I would view you as Andreas supervisor and I would be her representative at the PRC which would be here in Houston Brent NRONDEVELOPMENT AM To Mark CT cc Subject ACalo Arent you technically the Supervisor of Andrea What would be her PRC Forwarded by Brent HendryENRONDEVELOPMENT on AM Diana Perez PM To Brent HendryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Randy YoungENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject ACalo Pls advise who is the Supervisor and PRC for Andrea Calo thanks diana
